content: you i need to make a baby blanket me when is the baby shower you 2 weeks from today me i have just the kit for you we ve just put together our latest kit sliding is fun a baby blanket perfect for the stroller or car seat 26 x 29 soft and cozy we machine wash and dry this yarn on delicate in a soak eco wash bag 1 one skein each of juniper moon farms cumulus rainbow 2 and solid 3 94% cotton with a touch of nylon for strength knit on a us8 needle this blanket knits up fast it s just the knit stitch but we slide the stitches to the opposite end of the needle to work the next color creating a stockinette stitch section between each ridge we love how this shows off the gradient color in such a fun way we hope you love our color combinations as much as we do click here 4 to see all available kits the ravelry download includes two copies of the pattern please feel free to share with a friend 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/slim-eco-wash-bags-x56256358 htm 2 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/cumulus-rainbow-x50183054 htm 3 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/cumulus-x47665128 htm 4 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/kits/p/sliding-is-fun-x56782741 htm
